00870             inline Group* Group::create(Model* model,size_t capacity)
00871             {
00872                         Group* obj = new Group(model,capacity);
00873                         registerObject(obj);
00874                         return obj;
00875             }

00908             inline void Group::enableDistanceComputation(bool distanceComputation)
00909             {
00910                         distanceComputationEnabled = distanceComputation;
00911                         if (!distanceComputation) enableSorting(false);
00912             }
